name: One Day Cricket
overview: Summer is here and so, too, is the One Day International Cricket season. Australia, New Zealand, England and the West Indies vie for the coveted trophy. The M.C.G. is filled to capacity, the lights beam down on the wickets, the atmosphere is electric. Can you keep up the run rate? The bowler takes his run up and delivers a scorching ball down the pitch, you take a step back, swing your bat across your body, the crowd roars in excitement. One Day Cricket is a game which tests your skill and timing, do you measure up?
